sections.heading: 7-201 through 7-206 of this title shall be known and may be cited as the "Oklahoma School Consolidation and Annexation Act"
sections.text: Added by Laws 1989, c. 323, ยง 1, eff. July 1, 1989. Amended by Laws 1989, 1st. Ex.Sess., c. 2, ยง 8, operative July 1, 1990; Laws 2003, c. 296, ยง 1, eff. July 1, 2003; Laws 2009
